name: Z After
description:
A Where's Waldo with Zombies. Follow our heroine as she makes her way to save her family from the risen undead and find her truth behind Z After.

This is a two-stage alpha demo of my game Z After that I've been working on for about five years. The project is currently on hold due to a lack of funds, I'm not here to beg for money(could help push production along :O) What I'm really wanting is your insight on gameplay. What you really like and dislike about it, what could be done better, and overall your experience with Z After. 

Big thanks from the Z After team!
